location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP No. 2. to illustrate fighting near Qurna.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 168 x 150mm, on sheet 255 x 200mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume I, and shows a region around Qurna [Al Qurnah] in south-eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, settlements, hills and vegetation. Rivers and marshes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in June 1922.
